RedfishError.description: The error payload from a Redfish Service.
RedfishError.longDescription: The Redfish Specification-described type shall contain an error payload from a Redfish Service.

error.description: The properties that describe an error from a Redfish Service.
error.longDescription: This property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain properties that describe an error from a Redfish Service.

RedfishErrorContents.description: The properties that describe an error from a Redfish Service.
RedfishErrorContents.longDescription: The Redfish Specification-described type shall contain properties that describe an error from a Redfish Service.

code.description: A string indicating a specific MessageId from a Message Registry.
code.longDescription: This property shall contain a string indicating a specific MessageId from a Message Registry.

message.description: A human-readable error message corresponding to the message in a Message Registry.
message.longDescription: This property shall contain a human-readable error message corresponding to the message in a Message Registry.

@Message.ExtendedInfo.description: An array of messages describing one or more error messages.
@Message.ExtendedInfo.longDescription: This property shall be an array of message objects describing one or more error messages.

title: redfish-error.v1_0_1
